items.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO: Can this value focussed retailer create value for investors?
items.description: Targeting the middle and lower middle class, VMML has a wide portfolio with strong positioning and product range in the opening price points

items.title: Why real estate majors are flocking to Mumbai’s redevelopment market
items.description: The redevelopment landscape in Mumbai has created a market for real estate players nationwide with strong balance sheets to pursue prime projects in the city

items.title: Tesla restarts search for New Delhi showroom with DLF: Report
items.description: Tesla, which had paused its search for a showroom in India in recent months, is now in early-stage talks with DLF to help secure space in the capital region

items.title: Regulators should not stand in way of innovation, says CEA Nageswaran
items.description: Regulators need to distinguish between not standing in the way of moonshots and in which sectors do we need to be more conscious of social cost and benefits, the CEA said

items.title: ReNew Energy to buy out US-listed shares, top shareholders launch non-binding offer
items.description: Abu Dhabi Future Energy Company PJSC-Masdar, Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, Platinum Hawk C 2019 RSC Limited, and ReNew Energy CEO Sumant Sinha are offering $7.07 a share

items.title: HSBC’s CEO eyes $3 billion in potential savings from overhaul
items.description: HSBC is merging commercial banking into global banking and markets, while also hiving off its Hong Kong and UK businesses into standalone entities, and creating a new premier banking and wealth unit

items.title: Coca-Cola sells 40% stake in bottling arm HCCBL to Jubilant Bhartia Group
items.description: India is the fifth largest market of Coca-Cola globally. The Atlanta-headquartered firm is divesting bottling operations globally as part of its asset-light strategy.

items.title: Tata Power to foray into nuclear energy govt revises regulations, CEO Praveer Sinha
items.description: Tata Power has set an ambitious target of achieving revenue of at least Rs 1 lakh crore and a profit after tax of Rs 10,000 crore by 2030

items.title: Discover UPI’s Next Chapter Scaling the Billion Mark at Moneycontrol India Fintech Conclave 2024
items.description: Launched in 2016, UPI has revolutionized the way India transacts by offering seamless, real-time payment solutions

items.title: US Supreme Court tosses case involving securities fraud suit against Nvidia
items.description: The plaintiffs accused Nvidia and its top officials of concealing the impact of cryptomining on its business.
